languages.text: Бедняга почти успел выбраться из огня, но его зажало обломками.
The poor man almost made it out of the blaze in time, but got pinned down by the debris.
languages.original_text: Бедняга почти успел выбраться из огня, но его зажало обломками.

traits.locale_text: The poor man almost made it out of the fire in time, but got pinned down by the debris.
The poor man almost made it out of the fire in time, but got pinned down by the debris.
The poor man almost made it out of the blaze in time, but got pinned down by the debris.
The poor man almost made it out of the blaze in time, but got pinned down by the debris.
The poor man almost made it out of the blaze in time, but got pinned down by the debris.
The poor man almost made it out of the blaze in time, but got pinned down by the debris.

languages.text: El pobre hombre estuvo a punto de escapar de las llamas, pero los escombros le inmovilizaron.
languages.original_text: The poor man almost made it out of the blaze in time, but got pinned down by the debris.

traits.locale_text: El pobre hombre estuvo a punto de escapar de las llamas, pero los escombros le inmovilizaron.

languages.text: 可哀想なこの男は、あと一歩で炎から逃げ出せるというところで、瓦礫に足を挟まれてしまったようだ。
languages.original_text: The poor man almost made it out of the blaze in time, but got pinned down by the debris.

traits.locale_text: 可哀想なこの男は、あと一歩で炎から逃げ出せるというところで、瓦礫に足を挟まれてしまったようだ。

languages.text: 这个可怜人差点就从火海中逃出来了，但却被掉下来的重物砸倒了。
languages.original_text: The poor man almost made it out of the blaze in time, but got pinned down by the debris.

traits.locale_text: 这个可怜人差点就从火海中逃出来了，但却被掉下来的重物砸倒了。

languages.text: Der arme Mann hätte es beinahe noch rechtzeitig aus dem Inferno geschafft, wurde aber von dem Schutt festgenagelt.
languages.original_text: The poor man almost made it out of the blaze in time, but got pinned down by the debris.

traits.locale_text: Der arme Mann hätte es beinahe noch rechtzeitig aus dem Inferno geschafft, wurde aber von dem Schutt festgenagelt.

languages.text: Le pauvre homme tentait de fuir le brasier et aurait sans doute pu y parvenir s'il ne s'était pas retrouvé coincé sous des débris.
languages.original_text: The poor man almost made it out of the blaze in time, but got pinned down by the debris.

traits.locale_text: Le pauvre homme tentait de fuir le brasier et aurait sans doute pu y parvenir s'il ne s'était pas retrouvé coincé sous des débris.

languages.text: Zavallı adam az kalsın yangından sağ çıkabilecekmiş ama enkazın altında kalmış.
languages.original_text: The poor man almost made it out of the blaze in time, but got pinned down by the debris.
